activation.activationModal.letSActivateY: Să activăm licența ta pentru Unraid OS

connect.messages.serversEquippedWithAMyu: Servere echipate cu un certificat myunraid.net pot fi gestionate direct din interfața web Connect. Gestionați mai multe servere de pe telefon, tabletă, laptop sau PC în aceeași fereastră de browser.

downloadApiLogs.ifYouAreAskedToSupply: Dacă sunteți solicitat să furnizați jurnalele, vă rugăm să deschideți o cerere de suport pe pagina noastră de contact și să răspundeți la e-mailul primit cu jurnalele atașate.

registration.messages.aTrialKeyProvidesA: O cheie de probă oferă toată funcționalitatea unei chei de înregistrare Eliberate.
registration.messages.aValidKeyfileAndUs: Un fișier cheie valid și un dispozitiv de pornire USB Flash sunt necesare pentru a verifica actualizările OS.
registration.messages.errorCreatingATria: Eroare la crearea unei chei de probă. Vă rugăm să încercați din nou mai târziu.
registration.messages.manageYourLicenseK: Manage your license keys at any time via the My Keys section.
registration.messages.neverEverBeLeftWit: Never ever be left without a backup of your config. If you need to change flash drives, generate a backup from Connect and be up and running in minutes.
registration.messages.pleaseSignOutThenS: Please sign out then sign back in to refresh your API key.
registration.messages.youHaveExceededThe: You have exceeded the number of devices allowed for your license. Please remove a device before adding another.
registration.messages.yourLicenseInclude: Your {0} license included one year of free updates at the time of purchase. You are now eligible to extend your license and access the latest OS updates. You are still eligible to access OS updates that were published on or before {1}.
registration.messages.yourLicenseKeyIsNo: Your license key is not eligible for Unraid OS {0}
registration.messages.yourLicenseKeySOsU: Your license key's OS update eligibility has expired. Please renew your license key to enable updates released after your expiration date.
registration.messages.yourServerWillNotB:
Your server will not be usable until you purchase a Registration key or install a free 30 day Trial key. A Trial key provides all the functionality of an Unleashed Registration key.

Registration keys are bound to your USB Flash boot device serial number (GUID). Please use a high quality name brand device at least 1GB in size.

Note: USB memory card readers are generally not supported because most do not present unique serial numbers.

Important:

  • Please make sure your server time is accurate to within 5 minutes
  • Please make sure there is a DNS server specified
registration.messages.yourTrialKeyInclud:
Your Trial key includes all the functionality and device support of an Unleashed key.

After your Trial has reached expiration, your server still functions normally until the next time you Stop the array or reboot your server.

At that point you may either purchase a license key or request a Trial extension.
registration.messages.yourTrialKeyRequir:
Your Trial key requires an internet connection.

Please check Settings > Network
registration.outOfAllowedDevicesUpgradeY: {0} out of {1} allowed devices – upgrade your key to support more devices

store.server.itIsNotPossibleToUse:
It is not possible to use a Trial key with an existing Unraid OS installation.

You may purchase a license key corresponding to this USB Flash device to continue using this installation.
store.server.onJanuary1stSslCertificates: On January 1st, 2023 SSL certificates for unraid.net were deprecated. You MUST provision a new SSL certificate to use our new myunraid.net domain. You can do this on the Settings > Management Access page.
store.server.pleaseRefreshThePageToEnsur: Please refresh the page to ensure you load your latest configuration

store.server.requiresTheLocalUnraidApiTo: Requires the local unraid-api to be running successfully
store.server.thankYouForChoosingUnraidOs: Thank you for choosing Unraid OS!
store.server.theLicenseKeyFileDoesNot:
The license key file does not correspond to the USB Flash boot device. Please copy the correct key file to the /config directory on your USB Flash boot device or choose Purchase Key.

Your Unraid registration key is ineligible for replacement as it has been replaced within the last 12 months.
store.server.theLicenseKeyFileDoesNot2:
The license key file does not correspond to the USB Flash boot device. Please copy the correct key file to the /config directory on your USB Flash boot device or choose Purchase Key.

Your Unraid registration key is ineligible for replacement as it is blacklisted.
store.server.theLicenseKeyFileDoesNot3:
The license key file does not correspond to the USB Flash boot device. Please copy the correct key file to the /config directory on your USB Flash boot device.

You may also attempt to Purchase or Replace your key.
store.server.thereAreMultipleLicenseKeyF:
There are multiple license key files present on your USB flash device and none of them correspond to the USB Flash boot device. Please remove all key files, except the one you want to replace, from the /config directory on your USB Flash boot device.

Alternately you may purchase a license key for this USB flash device.

If you want to replace one of your license keys with a new key bound to this USB Flash device, please first remove all other key files first.
store.server.thereIsAPhysicalProblemAcce: There is a physical problem accessing your USB Flash boot device
store.server.thereIsAProblemWithYour: There is a problem with your USB Flash device
store.server.thisUsbFlashBootDeviceHas:
This USB Flash boot device has been blacklisted. This can occur as a result of transferring your license key to a replacement USB Flash device, and you are currently booted from your old USB Flash device.

A USB Flash device may also be blacklisted if we discover the serial number is not unique – this is common with USB card readers.
store.server.thisUsbFlashDeviceHasAn: This USB Flash device has an invalid GUID. Please try a different USB Flash device
store.server.toContinueUsingUnraidOsYou: To continue using Unraid OS you may purchase a license key. Alternately, you may request a Trial extension.
store.server.toSupportMoreStorageDevices: To support more storage devices as your server grows, click Upgrade Key.
store.server.usbFlashHasNoSerialNumber: USB Flash has no serial number
store.server.youHaveUsedAllYourTrial: You have used all your Trial extensions. To continue using Unraid OS you may purchase a license key.
store.server.yourLicenseKeyFileIsCorrupt:
Your license key file is corrupted or missing. The key file should be located in the /config directory on your USB Flash boot device.

If you do not have a backup copy of your license key file you may attempt to recover your key.

If this was an expired Trial installation, you may purchase a license key.

Your license key file is corrupted or missing. The key file should be located in the /config directory on your USB Flash boot device.

You may attempt to recover your key with your Unraid.net account.

If this was an expired Trial installation, you may purchase a license key.
store.server.yourTrialKeyIncludesAllThe:
Your Trial key includes all the functionality and device support of an Unleashed key.

When your Trial expires, the array will stop. At that point you may either purchase a license key or request a Trial extension.
store.server.yourTrialKeyIncludesAllThe2:
Your Trial key includes all the functionality and device support of an Unleashed key.

Your trial is expiring soon. When it expires, the array will stop. You may extend your trial now, purchase a license key, or wait until expiration to take action.
store.server.yourTrialKeyIncludesAllThe3:
Your Trial key includes all the functionality and device support of an Unleashed key.

Your trial is expiring soon and you have used all available extensions. When it expires, the array will stop. To continue using Unraid OS, you must purchase a license key.
store.server.yourTrialKeyIncludesAllThe4:
Your Trial key includes all the functionality and device support of an Unleashed key.

You have used all available trial extensions. When your Trial expires, the array will stop. To continue using Unraid OS after expiration, you must purchase a license key.
